Posts.Content: I was wondering if you have been offered six monthly zolodrenic acid drips to prevent osteoporosis and spread to bones.as noone seems to mention this on the website.
Posts.Title: I don't quite understand

Posts.Content: Hi as you see from replies there are many of us I was diagnosed with a grade two mucinous tumour after lumpectomy also diagnosed with sp dcis and had to have another op am told I am clear started hormone treatment and awaiting radium. I felt all along I've been told what treatment I was being given very little discussion although everyone was very nice.i also think that your team are waiting for results that do take quite a time.hope you get positive news soon
Posts.Title: Diagnosed with 2 types of breast cancer

Posts.Content: Did you  have  a  mastectomy  for your cancer or your nipple removed. I also had an inverted nipple and a tumour found which was removed during a lumpectomy.  But they left the nipple which is permenently inverted now second operation as the margins had not been clear and dcis found. Just on my second week of radium.anf feel ok.
